modeDescriptions.chat: Switched to chat mode. Feel free to ask for creative assistance.
modeDescriptions.enhance: Switched to enhancement mode. I can help refine characters, settings, and plot.
modeDescriptions.check: Switched to check mode. I will focus on consistency and logic issues.

welcome.chat: Hi! I'm your AI writing partner. I can help refine characters, expand worldbuilding, draft chapter outlines, and run consistency checks. What would you like to work on?
welcome.enhance: Welcome to enhancement mode! I specialize in enriching characters, deepening settings, and improving plot details. Let me know what you'd like to polish.
welcome.check: Welcome to quality check mode! I focus on spotting consistency, logic, and continuity issues. Tell me what to review.
